resources.string: To enable longpress back to kill set a longpress target in Navigation bar settings
Enables reboot, screenshot, airplane mode, and sound panel for the power menu
Turn the screen off to see the selected notification in action or dismiss this dialog to stop the test
Press on color below to apply
Abbreviated day of the week before the time
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
The default density of this device is:
"Reset the density to a default Android value"
If you\'ve run into compatibility issues: reset the market data
"Data couldn't be cleared, please clear it yourself!"
This feature is experimental and setting extreme values may cause layout issues. Do not report issues if you\'ve changed this setting.
"Changing your LCD density can cause unexpected app behavior. If you encounter market app incompatibility please return here and restart the process from step 1."
Use custom application instead of the recent applications dialog
Manage and customize the system animations
Note: Wallpaper animations involve animations performed from the launcher. Wallpaper closing is for moving away from viewing the wallpaper such as opening an app.
Set the animations for activities, apps, tasks etc
Reset all animation settings to default?
Pressing the home button will wake your device
Note: Most apps need to be restarted for custom values to take effect
Change the brightness by sliding across the statusbar. Note: Will not be active when auto-brightness is on
Disable the immersive ui swipe gestures
Hide the statusbar and dim the navbar when applicable
Please enter a new label. Enter an empty label to revert to stock label.
Add a memory usage bar to the recents panel
Hide custom ROM preferences and revert to a stock AOSP interface
Note: some settings are designed to stay active after they are set!
See through lockscreen with blur effect
Allows visibility of the application or home screen behind the lock screen.
Show screen Record option in Power Menu
Launches voice search/dialer with long press. Controls media with short press.
Show music widget while music is playing
Enable holding the power button with the screen off to control Torch
An alternative notification interface that launches apps as floating windows
Halo will appear for incoming tasks and scroll out of sight after a while
Applies for task switching and moving gestures
When opening an app with Halo the underlying app will get paused
Halo will disappear completely when empty
Show message box for incoming notifications
Halo will ping when device is unlocked if new notifications were received
Set the per app policy in Device -> Apps
Defines how big Halo is going to be
Halo message box animation for incoming notifications
From the power reboot menu: longpress the power key a second time to open the camera
Do you want to reset the navigation ring?
Choose number of targets in the navigation ring
Drag your finger to targets to assign actions
Rearrange by dragging by the handle on the right. Remove by swiping.
View or change quick settings style options
Landscape view doubles tiles per row quantity

WARNING: When ADB over network is enabled, your phone is open for intrusions on all connected networks, including GSM data network!

Only use this feature when you are connected on trusted networks.

Do you really want to enable this function?
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping.
Configure active display and lockscreen notifications
Trigger the camera flash when a notification is received
Excluded applications will not trigger flash notifications
Show interactive notifications on the lockscreen
Allow the notifications to be displayed
Secure lockscreen: Please enable lockscreen notifications in security
Warning: lockscreen is secure and notification content is enabled! Set privacy mode to disable.
Show active notifications when you take the device out of your pocket.
Always turn screen on when pulled out of pocket, even when there are no notifications pending
Hide items flagged low priority such as google now weather notifications
Allow dismissing even non-clearable notifications. Of course, they\'re just hidden from lockscreen and not from the notification panel.
Show notifications expanded by default. You still will be able to toggle between expanded and normal view.
Wake device when a new notification is received
Enabling active display overrides wake for lockscreen notifications
Number of notifications displayed at once
Offset to the top of the screen:
Disables notifications from beeing shown and dismissed. This way, you just see the icons of your notifications.
Excluded applications will not show up as lockscreen notifications
Show the notification text around the ring.
Show all notifications including ongoing, non-clearable notifications.
Excluded applications will not show up in active display.
Brightness level for displaying notifications when automatic brightness is not enabled.
Show the date above the clock
Show AM/PM indicator next to time when using 12hour format
Choose from a list to permanently remove system apps
This tool allows you to delete system apps. Use with caution and only delete apps you know are safe to be removed.
Are you sure you want to delete this app?
Use tablet-style dual panel settings if available
Allows phones to support multiple users like tablets do
Turn off logcat and dmesg buffers after boot to reduce kernel overhead
This will automatically manage your device battery usage and switch your network to user-defined power saving mode or normal mode depending on mobile data and Wi-Fi connection states
Activate power saving mode when screen turns off
When screen turns on, power saving mode won\'t be deactivated until keyguard is unlocked
Delays changing of power saving mode by specified number of seconds
Activate power saving mode when battery low
Change to power saving mode at:
Disable mobile data connection when power saving activated
This will automatically manage your device battery usage to user-defined
Disable Wi-Fi connection when power saving activated
Changing network to normal mode with specific interval time after screen turn off and power saving mode enabled
Activate Airplane mode when no network signal after 5 minutes
Show toast message when battery saver changes device configuration
Change the color, speed, animation etc for progress bars
Reset progress bar style to default?
Enables high-end visual effects such as transparent status/navigation bar (requires reboot)
Show the camera overlay under all windows
Draw more current to charge faster. Warning: this may damage the device.
Off: Displays the Google splash screen only
Default: Displays the system boot animation
This option will reset after a new flash!
Must draw gesture to unlock screen
How to draw an unlock gesture
Allow hover notifications in place of the default statusbar ticker or Halo
If the notification is not from a foreground app set it to be launched in floating mode.
Select apps to be blacklisted from hover notifications.
Require fullscreen immersive state for hover to display
Allow swiping to clear non-removable or persistent notifications
Exclude notifications from apps running in the foreground.
Add a space to allow the side menu keys in the navigation bar.
Switch to a button layout including the dpad keys when the keyboard is open
Enable the layout changer keys and set the number of enabled layouts
navigation bar layouts are currently enabled
All 5 navigation bar layouts are currently enabled
Allow legacy menu key to replace layout switch when requested
For proper functionality, OmniSwitch must be enabled and configured to start on boot. Would you like to be taken to OmniSwitch settings now?
Show recent apps panel on the left edge.
Display detailed info for cpu, display, etc
Configure the hours the device should be quiet
Times cannot overlap: setting to closest possible time
WiFi can be in any state
Require device to be plugged in
Device charging can be in any state
Quiet hours relies on time functions
Individual times per day are enabled
A single set of times is enabled
Follow ringer mode (always on and timed)
Quiet hours will enable when ringer is set to silent
Quiet hours will enable when ringer is set to vibrate or silent
When to start enforcing quiet hours
When to stop enforcing quiet hours
Notification light will function as normal
Haptic feedback will function as normal
System sounds will function as normal
This message will be sent to anyone who contacts you while quiet hours are active
[Automated Message] I\'ll get back to you when I can.
If an incoming message contains this text your phone will sound an alarm
" met the requirements to bypass Quiet Hours!"
Check for, view or install available updates
Could not load %s. Make sure you have storage available.
If an alarm is set remove its icon from the system icons
Don\'t scroll text from incoming notifications in the status bar
